title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: I hope, my dear James, that you sometimes think of Ambrose's, when going out to meditate at eventide by the shores of St Mary's Loch, orup away yonder to the Loch of the Lowes, where, when stillness i ks tin- sobtude, you even hear the Groy Mare's Tail
